summary: This mod fixes bald issues when wearing hoods (thieves hood for example) while being a vampire.
descriptionHtml:
Vampires Hood Fix by KitiFolien.


[color=cornflowerblue]DESCRIPTION [/color]

This mod fixes bald issues when wearing hoods (thieves hood for example) while being a vampire.  Look screenshot for more details.

Vampire Races fixed: Breton, Dark Elf, High Elf, Imperial, Nord, Orc, Red Guard and Wood Elf.

[color=coral]If you like this mod please Endorse it![/color]


[color=cornflowerblue]INSTALLATION [/color]

Automatically using Nexus Mod Manager (recommended):

- Download this mod clicking on Download with Manager in Files section.
- Activate it in Mods section on NMM.
- Overwrite if ask for it.
- See if the mod is activated in Plugins section of NMM.

Manually :

- Download .esp file Download manually in Files section.
- Extract the file VampiresHoodFix.esp in Data folder of your Skyrim installation root.
- Activate .esp file from launcher.


[color=cornflowerblue]MODIFIED ITEMS [/color]

- Thieves Hood
- Thieves Leader Hood
- Linwe´s Hood


[color=cornflowerblue]INCOMPATIBILITIES [/color]

None I suppose. Should work flawless with any language.


[color=cornflowerblue]KNOWN ISSUES [/color]

None. Please type a comment if you find something wrong or another hood that doesn\'t work with vampire race.



[color=gold]Other mods I have made (in Spanish):[/color]
